article_title: New poll: Majority of Americans support abortion restrictions
article_text:
01:31 Campaign Ad: John Kasich calls himself 'Our Only Hope' Pause

32:40 Obama's last White House Correspondents' Association Dinner speech

01:24 Can Cruz + Kasich really stop Trump?

01:53 Is Trump falling apart as he nears the finish line?

01:12 Can the Democrats unite at the July convention?

01:52 GOP voters: No new candidates should be introduced at the convention

01:17 Republicans: Trump should be nominated if he has delegate majority

02:00 Anonymous declares ‘total war’ on Donald Trump

article_metadata.title: New poll: Majority of Americans support abortion restrictions | McClatchy DC

og.description: A majority of Americans support restrictions on legalized abortions, including those who identify themselves as abortion rights supporters, according to a new Marist poll commissioned by the Knights of Columbus.
